DOC.brief_summary: A study ass effectiveness tolerability MK0653A MK0653A versus Atorvastatin lower LDL-C level .
DOC.criteria: Currently treat Atorvastatin 10 mg least 6 week Have Type 2 Diabetes Weight must stable 6 week enter study Consume 14 alcoholic drink per week . Pregnant lactating Have take another investigation drug within 3 month start study History congestive heart failure , heart attack , coronary artery bypass surgery Uncontrolled high blood pressure HIV positive History cancer last 5 year
